TEXT.TITLE: WATER SPORTS NETWORK BUYS DEBT FROM NTN
TEXT.BODY: <Water Sports Network> said it purchased 750,000 dlrs in convertible debentures from <NTN Communications Inc>. The companies said they are exploring ways to mutually market the programs and properties of each company. Reuter
